```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(DBI)
library(tidyverse)
library(pool)

```

Test connection string

```{r connect}
con <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), .connection_string = 'driver={SQLServer};server={DEQ-SQLODS-PROD,50000};database={ODS};trusted_connection=yes')
```

Test pulling data

```{r pull}
masterTaxaGenus <- dbGetQuery(con, 'SELECT * FROM "ODS"."dbo"."Edas_Benthic_Master_Taxa_View"')
```
